ygData.subject: Re: Azure
ygData.msgSnippet: AzureBlade was utterly taken by surprise, but he decided to ignore her until it was unavoidable... He was expendable after all. If he could bring justice along

X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

AzureBlade was utterly taken by surprise, but he decided to ignore 
her until it was unavoidable... He was expendable after all. If he 
could bring justice along the way, the better.

He raised his dual cannon and pressed it against the ship's somputer 
mainframe. His finger swiftly tightened the trigger and stayed there 
for a long moment. The cryo-clip steadily emptied itself, until it 
was down to 3%.

Meanwhile, he was exposed to most of the shots, some of which hit 
critical elements of his structure.

AzureBlade: You've only started to pay, renegade. Now though, I am 
disposed to fight you. Shall we?
